content.story: From the moment we met, we knew there was something special between us. What began as a spark grew into a deep and beautiful love that has filled our lives with joy, laughter, and endless adventures. Together we've built a bond that grows stronger each day, and now we're ready to begin our greatest adventure yet. We would be honored to have you join us as we celebrate our love and commitment to each other.
content.rsvpSubtitle: Please let us know if you can make it
content.closingMessage: We can't wait to celebrate with you!
